This page will show my solution for the DSB 2017 Challenge. I will do better after chanllenge.

my customary update of percentage of deep-learning papers in the major vision conferences. At CVPR 2015, I described its exponential growth, and after ICCV 2015 I wondered whether it had plateaued.

Since the CVF has not released the papers yet, I had to adapt my script to take the titles from the program. [UPDATE] CVF papers are online, so we can use the generic script shown below.
